column1: 124kph, swinging way down the leg side and called wide
129kph, back of a length on off, he tries to work to midwicket off the back foot but Faulkner fields in his follow through
125kph, back of a length on off, he works again to midwicket and again the bowler cuts it off
127kph, full into leg stump, he clips this neatly square of midwicket and the sweeper works hard to his left
full on middle and he clips this behind square! he was able to work this well away from the sweeper who is a long way infront of square
short on the hip, he glances wide of short fine leg, the man moves to his left and knocks it down but they get one
nearly a run out! Dunk knocks it short cover, Bailey races in, gathers and fires at the striker's, Dean is forced to dive, the throw missed, he might have got home anyway
shorter outside off, he punches off the back foot to cover-point
shorter on off, he gives room and forces off the back foot to cover
looped up outside off, he lofts this high inside out over mid off, didn't overhit, doesn't go all the way but they get a couple
94kph, darted in to leg stump, length ball, he's back and punching to long on
99kph, pushed through on middle, he sits back and tucks it to midwicket
83kph, shorter outside off, he goes back and whips through the big gap at midwicket and immediately calls two, it's well placed
138kph, good length, leg stump, he tucks this nicely behind square and works the sweeper a long way to his right
140kph, shorter length outside off, he's back and working this close to midwicket and pinching a single
141kph, shorter length, fifth stump line, he cuts to backward point and Milenko makes a good save on the ring
139kph, short lifting ball down the leg side, he withdrew his gloves inside the line
140kph, short into the ribs, he's back and he turns this around to fine leg

caught and bowled! This climbs off a good length outside off, it was a leg cutter, he tried to work to leg off the back foot, it catches the shoulder of the bat and balloons up in the air and Archer strolls through in follow through and takes an easy catch.

146kph, short into the ribs, he's hurried working this to square leg and almost slips over as they consider a single. Lucky they said no. Short hit the stumps at the striker's as Larkin got back in time
into leg stump, he works this off the front foot to forward square
shorter into the leg stump, he's back and working this nicely to deep backward square
90kph, tossed up on middle, he drives to long on
shorter into the hip, 95kph, he tries to whip but it hits the thigh guard
shorter into leg, he glances this straight to short fine leg
84kph, slower on leg stump, he works off the front foot to deep forward square
98kph, darted into leg stump, he gives room and punches hard to cover-point
98kph, darted into leg stump, he clips this with the angled to deep forward square
98kph, full outside off, he he drives hard straight of mid off, long on needs to run around to cut it off
75kph, slower outside off, he tries to square drive a length ball, gets a thick edge that goes to short third man
97kph, fired into leg stump, takes him on the pad but it's going down
99kph, arm ball, driven straight to mid off on the circle but hit too well to get one

123kph, punched off the back foot to cover, they take a single, Faulkner fires at the non-striker's and it beats two men backing up! Four overthrows! No need to throw that. But the backing up wasn't flash either

caught at midwicket! Back of a length, angled in and cramping Dunk for room, he tried to force a pull shot over midwicket but just hit it straight up in the air. Faulkner barely had to move in the ring at midwicket, he stays calm and takes the catch.
143kph, good length on off, he works this square of midwicket
143kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and across, and opening the face to run this down to third man
120kph, slower ball, wide off, he tries to square drive and misses
123kph, slower ball, fuller angled into middle and off, he clips it square of midwicket
short and wide, 142kph, he thrashes a cut shot backward of point and it flies to the short boundary! No chance to stop it
143kph, shorter and wider, he cuts hard in front of point to the man in the deep
147kph, fuller outswinger, he square drives on the up to backward point
146kph, play and miss trying to open the face and run it down to third man
143kph, short into the hip, he tried to whip, gets an inside edge onto thigh pad and it balloons behind square
142kph, quality bouncer, well directed and he ducks underneath it
116kph, short and wide and he slaps this off the back foot straight to cover in the circle
118kph, full on off, he clips this hard to wide long on but he hit it so well that they couldn't push for two
118kph, wide half-volley he drives slowly out to deep cover and they run well to get back easily
11kph, slower ball out of the back of the hand, he mistimes a cut to point and they try for a tight one, Maxwell was in trouble but the throw was wide
full outside off, driven very hard straight of long on and Bailey is working hard to save it and they run well
124kph, full outside off, he plays a classical cover drive to deep cover for a single
short, dragged down, he pulls hard to deep midwicket
88kph, shorter outside off, he cuts to short third man
short outside off, he cuts again but straight to backward point
shorter outside off, he cuts hard to deep cover-point
89kph, good length leg break on off, he slaps this on the up to cover
looped to middle and off, he works with the turn to the long boundary at wide long on for an easy two
95kph, short and he cracks a pull shot hard to find the gap at deep midwicket! Well placed
82kph, tossed up on leg, he sweeps hard to deep backward sqaure
pull shot over deep midwicket and into the crowd! It's the short boundary and he sits back and whacks it flat over the fence
Two in a row over midwicket! He didn't nail this pull shot but he got enough of it to carry Jofra Archer on the deep midwicket rope
full outside off, he whips it from way wide of off to long on
74kph, slower on off, he sweeps behind square to the man in the deep
shorter length over off, he gives room to cut and misses
142kph, into leg stump, he gets an inside edge that goes between the legs and flies fine of fine leg!
shorter on off, he's back and working this into the leg side
129kph, slower ball, he moves around, backing away, it follows him, he mistimes a hoick along the ground through midwicket
143kph, fuller outside off, he runs this off the front foot down to third man
144kph, shorter over middle, he's backs away and tries to slap over point but it beaten by some extra bounce
110kph, full and wide and plays a glorious square drive through cover-point! Excellent shot
112kph short and wide and he cuts this behind point and Short can't cut it off!
104kph, slower ball outside off, he mistimes this back to the bowler
120kph, full outside off, he whips with the bottom hand to deep midwicket
dropped! It was a wide full toss, he square drives in the air to backward point, Milenko diving to his right put it down! It got to him quicker than expected
Cracked flat over midwicket! What a shot! It was full outside off, he steps across it flicks it with the bottom hand flat over midwicket!
drifting down leg, he tucks it wide of short fine leg
87kph, looped up on middle, he backs away and miscues trying to hit over the off side, he drags it to long on
shorter outside off, he cuts hard to deep cover-point

Switch hit over cover and it sails into the stands! Are you kidding! Maxwell is a freak. He switches his stance and hands, turns around and hits it left handed over cover and they've lost the ball because it's gone out of the ground!

this is inside out right handed, conventional lofted drive over the cover boundary and it goes out of the ground again! Another lost ball! He's targeting the short side with ridiculous skill and execution. He gave himself room this time and flushed it
101kph, low full toss, he shaped to switch hit but it was a baulk, he slaps it off the bottom of the bat to cover and they run one
full outside off, he slices it off the end of the bat wide of third man and they run a couple
119kph, slower ball angled down leg, he steps inside and tries to launch it over fine leg, and misses but it's a wide
139kph, fired too wide of off this time. This is the pressure of Maxwell's ball striking
137kph, full outside off, tailing in, he drags a drive to long on
135kph, speared into leg, he cleared the front pad but it hit his front foot outside leg and rolls away for a leg bye
full wide yorker, perfectly bowled and beats the bat as he jams down
138kph, full toss outside off, he slaps a drive to deep cover-point
139kph, short and wide, he cuts down to wide third man
92kph, top spinner into leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
Huge appeal for LBW, not out! He tried to reverse sweep and missed. That was plumb! Pitched in line and was hitting middle and leg. Not a good decision.
bowled him! Slid through quicker and flatter, he gave room to slice behind point but it beat him for pace and crashed into off stump! Big wicket for the Hurricanes
leg break on off, he works neatly off the front foot infront of square leg, and they run two
wrong un, he's back and trying to read it off the pitch, he defends behind point and they pinch one
97kph, pushed through and he slaps it to cover
full into leg stump, he's back and clipping this through square leg
135kph, short ball, he's hit on the hand trying to pull over backward square. That was nasty
143kph, tailing into off, he clears the front leg and slaps it to mid off in the circle

LBW! Plumb this time! This was fired full and straight, he went back and across to try and whip behind square, was beaten for pace and misjudged the length, was hit plumb in front and the umpire had no hesitation in giving him out.
123kph, shorter outside off, he forces off the back foot to deep point
144kph, shorter outside off, he late cuts towards to wide third man
attempted paddle reverse sweep, he's hit on the pad, an appeal but not out. It's outside the line
shorter outside off, he mistimes a cut to cover-point
91kph, leg break into leg stump, just turned wide of short fine leg
lofted just short of long off and Meredith does well to knock it down
top spinner, he tries to turn to leg, gets a leading edge to cover
shorter on off, he punches off the back foot to mid off
140kph, wide full toss, he tries slash this behind point but is beaten for pace
142kph, beaten again outside off, trying to launch this inside out over cover. It just misses off stump
122kph, slower ball, off cutter, he's back and defending back to the bowler
140kph, play and miss again shorter and wider outside off, he tries to upper cut and misses
french cut, under edge, past off stump, Wade can't glove it and it runs to the rope! Wade is annoyed. He could have stopped that
141kph, sliced high in the air off the outside edge but falls well short of deep point
LBW appeal trying to heave with the spin over midwicket, but it's not out, it's missing leg and they get a leg bye
lofted inside out over cover-point and it sails on the breeze onto the hill! So hard to defend that side. He gave himself room and lifted it high inside out onto the concourse on the hill!
backs away, he fires to leg stump, Stoinis slaps this straight to cover
93kph, leg break on off, he square drives to deep point
skips down the track and whips this hard into the gap at square leg! Amazing timing. That's the long boundary and he picked the gap!

caught at deep backward square! Leg break, tossed up on leg, he tried to slog sweep with the spin, he took one hand off the bat and dragged it behind square, Faulkner watched it carefully, it dipped on him but he held on falling forward
140kph, full outside off, he tries to drag across the line to the short boundary and misses. Wade appeals for caught behind but it's not out
140kph, full outside, he drags this down to deep midwicket along the ground
123kph, slower ball, good length, he pushes this to cover-point for a single
hooked onto the hill! This was a high bouncer outside off, he rocked back and swivelled on a great hook shot and deposited it way back onto the hill
full outside off, he drags to deep midwicket but they only get one
139kph, bouncer outside off, and he backed away and was not in a position to hit it. Well bowled
82kph, drifting into leg, he whips this easily to deep midwicket
91kph, drifting in and sliding on, he defends from the crease
shorter on the back foot he forces down the ground to long on
shorter outside off, 93kph, he punches off the back foot to deep cover
shorter on off, he's back and clipping this through midwicket to the sweeper
fuller, 90kph, drifting into middle, he stays back and tucks it around the corner to backward square
magnificent cover drive on the up! Good length outside off and he drives on the up through over-point with ease!
beaten, trying to force off the back foot to a 131kph, back of a length ball that nipped away
125kph, into leg stump, he's back and working this off the hip through square leg
drops short and he hammers a pull shot infront of square and it goes one bounce over the rope!
135kph, good length angled into off stump, he tucks this to midwicket
119kph, slower ball, shorter, he tries to short arm jab a pull shot over midwicket and is beaten by the slower pace
short outside off, he cuts hard through point and forces the sweeper to his right and gets two
darted into middle and leg, he's back and tucking through midwicket
94kph, pushed through outside off, he cuts hard to deep point
89kph, slower into leg stump, he pushes this gently to midwicket
89kph, drifting down leg, Dunk can't glove it, Maxwell yelled catch it, but it's called wide
lofted beautifully inside out over mid off! Just a fraction full, he stays still in the crease and lofts through the line and clears the man in the circle
shorter and he's back and punching to long on
129kph, pushed way down the leg side for a wide
123kph, length ball, he clears the right leg and flat bats it back to the bowler who does well to field it
100kph slower ball, he mistimes a drive to wide mid on
126kph, short and wide, he mistimes a cut to point
128kph, he backs away to a length ball over off, he tries to slap this over point but misses
101kph, slower ball, he tries to launch down the ground but drags it along the ground to deep midwicket
105kph, slower ball, but Wade spots it, waits and cuts nicely through point, placing it well and it races to the rope!
full and wide and he square drives powerfully behind point! This was hammered and no one stood a chance to stop it
129kph, short and wide, he cuts and gets an under edged fine of short third man who is inside the circle!
slower ball full toss dispatched over deep midwicket! This is a gift to Short. He launched, didn't nail it but didn't need to to the small boundary!
127kph, cut backward of point! Another boundary. Short and angled across and he picks the gap beautifully
full outside off, he pushes straight of mid off and they take an easy one
133kph, full outside off, he drives nicely out to deep point
119kph, short ball, got big him, he tries to pull, comes off the slice and balloons safely into the off side
123kph, shorter length outside off, he tries to lean back and late cut but misses
135kph, good length, he stands still and hammers a drive wide of mid off and Bravo makes a crucial diving save!
114kph, slower ball dragged down the leg side for a wide

caught behind! An extraordinary dismissal! Cross seam high bouncer, he went to pull and then tried to bail out of the shot, but left the bat up, it just touched the edge and flew high above Dunk and he reached up with the right hand and plucked it! What a breakthrough

nearly a run out! Doolan just tucked it to Stoinis at midwicket and called yes, Wade was slow to respond, Stoinis had all the time in the world to steady and hit at the striker's end and he missed! Wade had given up.
shorter outside off, he places a pull shot forward of square leg and they run well to get two
84kph leg break outside off, he punches off the back foot to deep cover-point
83kph, wrong un, shorter outside off, he punches to long off

Bowled him! Perfect wrong un! Did him all ends up! He pitched this outside off, Doolan leaned forward to drive not picking it, it spun back through the gate and crashed into off! He charges away to celebrate and so does Nepal!!
84kph, tossed up leg break, he reaches out and drives to deep cover
85kph, wrong un, outside off, he reaches out and paddle sweeps fine for a single
85kph, wrong un, he goes back on his stumps and works this through midwicket from right in front of the stumps
90kph, leg break on off, he's forward and working this against the turn through midwicket
89kph full toss, he reverse sweeps straight to backward point
89kph outside leg, he reverse sweeps and squeezes this fine off the bottom edge to short third man
tucked off the back foot through forward square
85kph, tossed up on off, he drives to long off
95kph, pushed through on off, he clips this to wide long on
83kph, leg break outside off, he works it against the turn to midwicket
88kph leg break on middle, reverse sweeps to backward point
89kph, shorter length, he premeditates a reverse sweep and mistimes to backward point
88kph, angled into leg stump, he tucks this behind square to the man in the deep
85kph, dragged down leg and he has to stretch to reach it but paddle sweeps it very fine and cleverly for four!
86kph, on middle, he paddle sweeps again and fine leg is wide, they run well for a couple
drifting down leg and he sweeps fine of short fine! Just drifting into his arc and he was able to work it fine with a full swing
shorter length, he punches down to long on
looped up at 84kph, he drives powerfully past cover and it races to the short boundary! Great shot with immense power
on leg stump, he defends this to the circle at mid on and immediately calls two, McDermott races back and beats the throw
89kph leg break, he pushes a drive to long on
90kph, fired into leg, he tries to work to the onside, gets and outside edge that runs fine of third man
late cut past short third man! 129kph just a touch short and wide and Wade waits and places this perfectly past third man who is up
128kph, short and wide, he cuts hard to deep point
128kph, shorter on off, he's back and tucking this to square midwicket
135kph, good length on off, he whips this beautifully past midwicket, with supreme timing, and they race back for three
135kph, short ball, he miscues a pull shot, but it falls safe well short of deep square
139kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends to mid on
slower ball, 102kph, dragged down the leg side
127kph, short ball wide of off, he gets a bottom edge cutting, it bounces short of Dunk and he can't glove it
129kph, good length but too wide of off stump and correctly called wide
130kph, full and tailing into off, he drives down to long on
128kph, bouncer, Wade stands up and cracks a pull shot straight to deep midwicket, only one
130kph, full and wide, he drives nicely to deep cover-point
102kph, slower ball, full toss on leg, he clips this behind square to deep backward square
131kph, full, almost yorker length outside off, he squeezes it out to cover
110kph, good length slower ball, he defends to point
slower ball picked by Wade and he smashes this over long on into the stands! What a way to bring up 50! Super stroke
132kph, good length into the pads, he tries to swing it away but misses and is struck on the pad
111kph, slower ball, outside off, he drives to cover
yorker tailing in, he jams it down onto the crease, Wade wanted one but McDermott calls no
116kph, slower ball, he tries to swing it away on the leg side but is through it too early and gets hit on the body and they get a leg bye
84kph, wrong un outside off, he leaves this alone

caught at short fine leg! Good length leg break on off, Wade goes to sweep, it bounces a touch more than expected, he gets a top edge and it flies to Zampa at short fine and he takes an easy catch! Sandeep does it again
87kph, shorter leg break, he's back and defending to midwicket and no one is in the circle
86kph, shorter leg break on leg, he punches off the back foot to deep midwicket
short and hammered over deep square leg! It was dragged down, he saw the length, went back quickly and launches it over the deep backward square boundary
89kph, leg break, good length on off, he defends to midwicket
85kph, shorter leg break, he's back and forcing to cover
lovely lap sweep from outside off, ramping it to the vacant short fine and deep backward square comes around
92kph, shorter outside off, he's punching off the back foot to long off
wrong un, he steps inside to ramp it, just gets a touch on it past the stumps and the keeper for a couple
reverse sweeps from outside off to short third man
92kph, drifting into leg stump, he clips this beautifully through midwicket and they run superbly

LBW! Another one claimed by the wrong un! It pitched outside off, he stretched forward to defend, it spun back past the inside edge and hit him on the front pad, was it in line? Was it going over? The umpire thought so! Sandeep celebrates again!
leg break outside off, pushed to cover-point
shorter outside off, he's back and punching to long on
wrong un, he's back and working this behind square on the leg side
shorter length, he's back and pulling behind square
84kph, wrong un, he's back and working to midwicket
pushed through on leg stump, he works this to the gap at midwicket
86kph, full outside off, he square drives to deep point
drifting into leg stump, he whips this through square midwicket
92kph, tossed up and drifting in, he drives to long on
skips down the track and drives back to the bowler who does well to knock it down
88kph, tossed up and driven hard to long off
full toss angled down leg and he clips this easily between two men behind square on the leg side! That was a gift and the pressure is released
129kph, shorter outside off, he tries to cut and misses playing over the top of it
100kph, slower ball, he punches off the back foot down to long on
131kph, fired wide of off, too wide, outside the guidelines and it's called
129kph, good length outside off, play and miss on the drive, Bravo appealed loudly for caught behind but the umpire wasn't interested
130kph, full outside off, he drives to deep point

dropped at long off for four! Larkin again! He dropped two in Canberra! He launched this down to long off, but didn't get it, Larkin running to his right on the rope, it bursts through his hands above his shoulders and falls behind him and bounces over the rope!
low full toss, 129kph, on off, he glides this off an open face to third man
hammered over cover into the crowd on the short side! He cleared the front leg, leaned back and lofted this through the line over the cover fence!
136kph, full toss, driven straight to mid off
short ball pulled through midwicket and Hurricanes win!
